experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis with RNAi-mediated knockdown of AtERF73/HRE1 after growth in hypoxic conditions

description.text: To mimic natural flooding conditions, we have adopted an “open system” treatment, in which only roots are subjected to hypoxia treatment.  Using microarray analysis, we identified a number of AP2/ERF genes in Arabidopsis that are induced at different stages of hypoxia treatment. we performed microarray analysis to compare gene expression profiles of wild-type and AtERF73/HRE1-RNAi20 upon normaxic or hypoxic condition, in which AtERF73/HRE1 expression was severely knocked down. Arabidopsis Affymetrix GeneChip arrays were probed with RNAs isolated from roots of untreated plants (controls) and plants treated with hypoxia for 6 h.

bibliography.authors: Yang CY, Hsu FC, Li JP, Wang NN, Shih MC.
bibliography.title: The AP2/ERF transcription factor AtERF73/HRE1 modulates ethylene responses during hypoxia in Arabidopsis
